Summary: I taped this object going over my place
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside, and saw this object. I grabbed my camcorder and taped it. I have a Sony DVD Camcorder that uses a 3 inch disc. all the time I leaned against a door frame to tape this object. I used the zoom, it is 24 power. I live near the Atlanta Air Port. I see jets all day and night long. There is a flight path that goes over my place. The time of duration was about 2 minutes. I watched the object go out of sight. It went from west to east. The weather condition was clear, there were no obstructions preventing me from taping the thing. I see planes all the time, some are high altitude and have a trail. It is not too difficult to see a plane ahead of the trail. But as you will see, this object had no plane ahead of its contrail. I knew as soon as I saw this thing that it was not normal. It made no sudden turns, or anything, it just went over and out of sight.The event is in two segments. I stopped temporarily to get my tripod, but elected to simply lean against a door frame for steady footage. I sent this report to a friend who has a UFO Investigation Group, but the investigation was very lacking. I had to wait months to get back my disc of the event. This was due to the administrator's unprofessional demeanor.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Forest Park
There were no other sightings in Forest Park on or around September 6th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
